name: Shield Man
description:
Shield Man takes you on an epic journey to reunite too long lost lovers. 

Shield Man is a hardcore 2D platformer built for speedrunners and lovers of satirical humor. Use the unique shield bash mechanic to navigate the increasingly absurd levels to save your princess Hilta.

This game was made by Slender Loris:

Alex Mitchell - Programming
Andy Findlay - Programming
Danny Prosser - Animation
Keelan Fitzsimons- Design
Kevin Hermanson - Design
Millie - Art
Nate - Art
Rob Rayner - Programming
Sam Hall - Design
Tom Richmond - Audio
